player_decision.reason: Button open 3-handed with position; min-raise applies pressure while risking least with a marginal hand.

Facing Alice's 20 preflop bet with Tc3c in a 3-handed pot, calling 15 to see the flop gives about 30% equity against a reasonable raise range. Folding is weak here, and a larger raise with a marginal hand is not justified. All-in is too risky with a marginal hand and 85 chips behind.
KTo is playable but not strong enough to isolate or shove multiway. Calling costs only 10 to see a flop in a 50-chip pot, preserves stack and keeps options postflop against two opponents.

You hold a middle pair (3s) on a coordinated flop (9-4-3) in a three-way pot. A small bet of 10 protects your hand, denies equity to overcards and backdoor draws, and keeps you in the hand without risking too much of your tournament life.

Cheap bet (10 into 70) offers great pot odds to see the turn. I have two overcards (K and T) that can pair for a likely best hand and calling keeps the pot manageable and preserves stack for later streets.
J6 high with no draw on 9-4-3 two-tone facing donk bet and a call multiway; poor equity and bad bluff spot with short SPR. Preserve stack.

You have a middle pair (3s) on a coordinated turn with two opponents still in. Calling keeps the pot manageable and lets you re-evaluate on the river rather than committing more chips with a marginal hand.

Holding K-T on 9d 4c 3d 3h: no pair and unlikely to be best. Opponent called the flop and turn, suggesting a made hand (pair) — bluffing looks risky. Preserve chips and see the river by calling rather than raising or shoving.

River value-bet with a strong hand (set of threes) to extract from worse and deny a cheap showdown. A mid-size bet (~40) targets worse pairs and bluffs, while leaving some chips behind for future hands.

Board (9d 4c 3d 3h 5d) pairs the 3s and gives many value hands (9x,5x,3x, made flushes) that beat my K-T. Villain’s line and short stack (20 behind after a 40 bet) looks value-heavy or polarized; calling 40 into 80 requires ≈20% equity which I don’t have. Preserve the 90 stack and fold.
